properties.name: redmine.protocol.name
properties.description: The ticket type use for protocol

properties.name: redmine.protocol.mandatory
properties.description: List of field names of mandatory fields in issue

properties.name: redmine.protocol.fields.number
properties.description: Field name for the protocol number

properties.name: redmine.protocol.fields.members
properties.description: Field name for the meeting's attendants

properties.name: redmine.protocol.fields.location
properties.description: Field name for the location of the meeting

properties.name: redmine.protocol.fields.moderation
properties.description: Field name for the person responsible for moderation

properties.name: redmine.protocol.fields.devotion
properties.description: Field name for the person responsible for devotion

properties.name: redmine.issues.link
properties.description: The link prefix to each specific issue, excluding the issue id

properties.name: redmine.mail.recipient
properties.description: Recipient for the mail with protocol attachment

properties.name: redmine.mail.subject
properties.description: Subject for sending the protocol mail. Must contain exactly one template parameter: the date of the meeting (denoted as %s).

properties.name: redmine.mail.body
properties.description: Body for sending the protocol mail. Must contain exactly one template parameter: the date of the meeting (denoted as %s). HTML allowed.
